title: Remove endorsement from backend GraphQL layer
description: Delete src/backend/app/graphql/types/endorsement.py entirely. Then edit src/backend/app/graphql/types/user.py to remove: the _endorsements private field, the endorsements property/resolver, the EndorsementType import, and the endorsement conversion logic in from_model. Then edit src/backend/app/graphql/types/__init__.py to remove the EndorsementType import and export. Then edit src/backend/app/graphql/types/tribe.py to remove _endorsements=[] from all UserType constructions. Then edit src/backend/app/graphql/types/project.py to remove _endorsements=[] from all UserType constructions. Finally edit src/backend/app/graphql/queries/health.py to remove the Endorsement import, the selectinload(User.endorsements_received) eager loading chain, and endorsements=user.endorsements_received from UserType construction.
acceptance_criteria:
- src/backend/app/graphql/types/endorsement.py does not exist
- No reference to endorsement in user.py, tribe.py, project.py, __init__.py, or health.py
- python -c "from app.graphql.types import UserType" succeeds
- python -c "from app.main import app" succeeds
